Media & Tech insights for data driven decisions

Unlock a clearer understanding of how Canadians consume media and adopt new technologies. MTM turns complex datasets into actionable insights so you can plan confidently and stay ahead of change.

Why Leading Organizations Trust Us

We deliver strategic advantages with our data-driven insights into Canadian media habits. Our detailed reports, powered by cutting-edge tools, are known for their actionable intelligence, ensuring leaders remain at the forefront of industry trends.

Reports that Drive Decisions

Whether you're tracking fast-moving trends, understanding audiences, or making strategic decisions, MTM provides the clear evidence you need. Our reports distill nationwide media and technology behaviour into clear, actionable insights.

Solutions for Every Decision Maker

Every role has different priorities. Explore solutions by your role to help you find the MTM insights and products that support your specific decision-making needs.

Products built on MTM Data

Explore MTM’s suite of products designed to turn audience data into actionable insights for strategy, planning, and decision-making. Our products empower you to make informed choices that drive success.

MTM 18+ Canadians 18+

MTM 18+ pioneered media technology monitoring in Canada 25 years ago. Annually surveying over 12,000 Canadians.

Learn More
Juniors Canadians 2-17

MTM Junior is the first annual youth media survey in Canada. It focuses on the behaviours and activities of Canadians.

Learn More
Newcomers Arrivals in the past 5 years

MTM Newcomers is the premier media and tech survey focusing on newcomers in Canada (within 5 years).

Learn More

Understanding the Canadian population is critical for making smart business decisions.
